name: Lord's Destiny
description:
Trek through the dragon's castle and save the princess! Lord's Destiny is an action platformer where you control the Knight throughout multiple levels! Slash through obstacles and enemies alike to reach the end door! This is the free version, and will be displaying ads during gameplay. Players will be allowed to purchase in-game currency to gain cosmetics and power up their character. Contains in-app purchases.

gigaerick - Programmer

SkeletalGadget - Art

Kevin MacLeod - Music

Made for twitch.tv/moonmoon and his biannual game jam (2022 2nd Moonjam).
